website_summaries.verdict: With a special tooth angle that prevents chipping, these burrs get the job done in projects with wood and aluminum. You might have a tougher time with harder materials like iron, though.
pros: 8-piece set includes SA, SC, SD and SF type burrs
Unique tooth angle helps to prevent chipping
Great for opening holes and porting heads on ferrous materials
Sintered and machined from raw tungsten carbide
cons: Not as good for iron and other hard materials, but works well with softer materials like wood and aluminum

customer_reviews.title: Best carbide bits ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are frankly the best carbide bits I have ever owned. I have a 20 yr old air grinder that honestly is not that great, along with a 25 yr old 20 gallon/120 psi compressor. At 80 psi, these bits just absolutely ate up 7/16 thick steel. I needed to window a few holes about 1/8" and I was able to open each hole up in about 10 seconds. I was shocked. Best bits ever. In the right tool these might be difficult to use without turning down line pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M.

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use with an electric Makita 1/4th die grinder. I picked this set simply because the reviews on them were good and they were expensive so that means they work right? Well yes they cut through anything. I cleaned up some welds, grinded away some stuck bolts, and carved out a door latch with these. Very happy with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Spend extra and buy from a tool store!!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap price, cheap product. I have carbide burrs that are 20 years old and I have used them for hours, these are very poorly milled, uneven teeth, not very sharp, and they might as well be steel, they get dull very quickly. I switched back to my 20 year old dull ones after 10 minutes of use.
customer_reviews.author: FLORIDA GUY

customer_reviews.title: Much cheaper from Amazon then through the MAC or MATCO ...
customer_reviews.text: Much cheaper from Amazon then through the MAC or MATCO catalog When working with Aluminum just spray the bit with some WD40 while using them and stop every so often and clean the aluminum out with a wire brush every so often and they will last you for years to come. NOTE: I have been using them for porting LSA superchargers
customer_reviews.author: Team America

customer_reviews.title: Works great on fat mig welds, Has held up to repeat abuse.
customer_reviews.text: Picked these up to grind down some mig welds and they worked great. Quick learning curve, my first few grinds were very deep but I got the hang of it. - I have used it on about 100 2" long welds in a lot of corners and the 2 largest bits look very good, there are a few chips in the teeth but they still preform well
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: these worked great. they are so strong I bent the hell ...
customer_reviews.text: these worked great. they are so strong I bent the hell out of one and was able to bend it back. I feel the metal is very high quality, otherwise it would have snapped. I trimmed metal, plastic, and more. one of my favorite parts is the quality plastic case which holds them well so you don't loose them.
customer_reviews.author: dspot

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Carbide Burr's
customer_reviews.text: These are very good carbide burr's. I used a couple of them to port a LS oil pump. They paid for themselves just doing that one small porting job. I don't know how they would fair if used everyday? For me being a DIY'ER they are of very good quality and I will purchase them again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: G8 GT 6L.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: NOT professional grade but absolutely adequate for the DIY person. Used these to enlarge holes on a Chevy exhaust manifold flange and it chewed through material better than expected. Also used them to remove burrs on other metal with similar results. When they wear out I will buy another set.
customer_reviews.author: D.A.

customer_reviews.title: The absolutely perfect solution!
customer_reviews.text: I was at the very end of assembling an exercise machine. The last piece of tubing had metal spurs which prevented me from attaching it. This tool save the day! The machine is completely assembled without having go through the hassle of contacting the manufacturer for a replacement part.
customer_reviews.author: D A Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great bits!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bits for the money. There are cheaper bits out there, but I didn't want to take a chance. These don't break the bank either, and seem to work great so far with daily use.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Eats through metal like butter on a hot day
customer_reviews.text: I'm in the process of building a house and have used this set to enlarge holes in a few of the hold down brackets and this set grinds the metal like butter in the middle of summer. Been using this set with my new DEWALT DWMT70783 grinder (see other review) and the two were made for each other.
customer_reviews.author: soaknewe (so can you)

customer_reviews.title: Handy tool to cut hardened material
customer_reviews.text: Tool came in handy when I had a hardened tool bit piece stuck in crankshaft but hole. Drill would not cut at all. Tool bit grinded out hardened piece with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this kit to clean up some small holes at the shop. Within about 5 minutes of its very first use, the head of the bit snapped off. I didn’t abuse it or put any stress on it at all, it just snapped off. I was already out of my return window for Amazon, so I tried contacting the manufacturer, nothing. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product for the shade tree mechanic or to have ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't beat it. They won't last quite as long as the expensive ones but they get the job done. We just replaced the ones that we used a lot with "nicer" ones and kept the rest just in case. Perfect product for the shade tree mechanic or to have in your garage
customer_reviews.author: Fred S.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Power
customer_reviews.text: Needed to grind away weeds in a tight spot on a Jeep Wrangler frame and this tool did awesome
customer_reviews.author: bemery104

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Sharp little burrs they hold up very well And retain their sharpness great products of money
customer_reviews.author: mtcowboy2000

customer_reviews.title: Just like the best.
customer_reviews.text: This is the type of tool that you must use properly for it to do it's job without damaging it. I have been using mine for two years and they have worked very well as the expensive brands. If I needed more of them I would get these again, but mine are still like new. I stress, " use properly ".
customer_reviews.author: DON KING

customer_reviews.title: great kit
customer_reviews.text: very handy to use when sharpening a chain to to use to clean any type grinding slag
customer_reviews.author: Big Jim                                 Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Burrs I have used
customer_reviews.text: Used them the day I got them they work amazing very sharp such an amazing product astro always makes good products 10 stars if I could give
customer_reviews.author: Antonio C Michael

customer_reviews.title: Love these Carbides !
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these with some hesitation because my Snap On Tool guy wanted $55 for just one of these carbides. I've used them several times now and they seem avery bit as good as the Snap on carbide bits that I have purchased. An awesome buy for the money !!! Really can't go wrong with a set of eight bits! BUY THESE! They will not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: nascarfrk

customer_reviews.title: They like to bounce and walk
customer_reviews.text: These burrs are sharp and they cut well and seem durable. I use them in metal fabrication projects. They like to bounce and walk. There are probably better ones out there but for the price these are quite good.
customer_reviews.author: HJS

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: These have preformed very well. They are very good value for the money.I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a good product
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a good product. Haven't had the chance to use them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G. Schochenmaier

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well with my die grinder. Cuts soft metal very well. Haven't had a chance to use it on hardened metal yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have and worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Used these babies to finish up a custom metal fab job! I had been killing myself using some cheap bits and when I started using these, I could see metal flakes flying and I could actually see quick progress. A must have.
customer_reviews.author: Double D

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice if the case was'nt such a piece
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice if the case was'nt such a piece. The latch doesn't latch, so the bits could easily scatter if you drop it and they pop out of their holders. The bits look well made though. But I like cases... so 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: bullshtstopshere

customer_reviews.title: Headache Removers
customer_reviews.text: Mechanics, assemblers, fabricators etc. These are good quality and will hold up under extreme use. Be careful not to take off too much metal, it comes off quick.
customer_reviews.author: chly000579

customer_reviews.title: Great bits, low vibration and a nice case
customer_reviews.text: outstanding bits, perfect size at 4" long. low vibration and a very nice cut. no problems at all, and for less than half the price of Matco for the EXACT same set. comes in a very nice gray plastic case.
customer_reviews.author: hvacr

customer_reviews.title: GOT THESE BECAUSE I DONT WELD VERY GREAT AND IT WAS ON A RUSTY CORE SUPPORT TO ...
customer_reviews.text: GOT THESE BECAUSE I DONT WELD VERY GREAT AND IT WAS ON A RUSTY CORE SUPPORT TO BOOT. BROKE ONE OFF THE BAT THINK IT CAUGHT A WELD BENT AND CHIPPED IT. SO TAKING THE BLAME ON THAT. BUT USED ALL OF THEM FOR SOME GREAT GRIND DOWN WORK BEFORE PREP.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL

customer_reviews.title: far better then I expected
customer_reviews.text: Use these to get in some tight spaces to repair some Welds. Could not believe how fast they cut. Awesome quality for a great price. I will be getting a few more sets and the case is blow mold with a snap cover. Not sure why they don't tell you about this extra feature. Keeps the burs from damaging my other tools in my tool bag. Over all great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I don't use these all time, but they work very well in cleaning up corrosion on wheel hubs, etc.
customer_reviews.author: vmsmgr

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The quality and durability is all you need to question and theres no doubt about this one. Cheap bits lose their sharpness and "grit", nothing will last longer than these. They get the job done
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: Sure beats the cheap junk I had before.
customer_reviews.text: These work very well. I use them with a Dewalt air tool and they make excellent cuts. Shaft length is very good so you can firmly anchor them in the tool, or have them extended when necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Gradwohl

customer_reviews.title: these things work great. Have had no problems except for the time ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these things work great. Have had no problems except for the time I tried to use them on aluminum. Clogged up fast there. But, cleaned that bit out and it is still sharp to this day.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Payton

customer_reviews.title: Carbide cutting bits for die grinder.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set of cutters for my work shop. I have used only one of the cutters to date but found it to be very affective and removing metal. These are quality cutters.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Byrne Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Great for small jobs and fits my new Metabo GE710 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for small jobs and fits my new Metabo GE710 Compact 13000 to 34000 Rpm 6.4-Amp Die Grinder Compact Variable Speed, 710-watt perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Haney

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Does what I ask of it. Doesn't get clogged on aluminum
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: They work good, but I've noticed some chipped edges pretty early ...
customer_reviews.text: They work good, but I've noticed some chipped edges pretty early into light usage and they clog if you use then on any soft metals like brass
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Heinrichs

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Have not used bits yet. Seems to be good quality. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: rona

customer_reviews.title: Quality tools
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was lookinf for, my project is grinding stress cracks on my fiberglass sailboat. These grinding bits work perfectly I would buy again, also the plactic holder they come in works nice. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: some of them hold up
customer_reviews.text: they work well and stay sharp for a long time. i did break the large oval one the first time i used it, but the rest of them are holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Lahara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent burr set
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of these I have bought. I tried them and they were very satisfactory. I hope they continue to cut well. The second set is for my son as he also is a dedicated do-it yourself person.
customer_reviews.author: Gofast

customer_reviews.title: Great bits!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty durable for the money. A lot less price than others
customer_reviews.author: Anita Fleischer

customer_reviews.title: goes great with the die grinder to get in tight spaces ...
customer_reviews.text: goes great with the die grinder to get in tight spaces and really cleans out a hole. when you get the hang of the power and control it, it will leave a smooth surface.
customer_reviews.author: jerry ballard

customer_reviews.title: Not the ASTRO of old !!!
customer_reviews.text: Yrs back "ASTRO" used to be the cheap tools. These bit are proof they have stepped up their game. Sharp, well made bits you should get yrs out of. Worked like a charm for me !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Zink

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & Great value. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.text: These puppies can remove some material FAST. I was pleasantly surprised with the product quality. If they wear out, I wouldn't hesitate to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Never had a problem and I use them daily had them for over a year
customer_reviews.text: Great set for sure. I use these on everything. Steel,fiberglass,aluminum and plastic
customer_reviews.author: Tinman

customer_reviews.title: Like butter!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set, sharp and cuts mild steel like butter with a pneumatic die grinder!
customer_reviews.author: B. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good for cast iron
customer_reviews.text: Skeptical at cheap price but I got to tell you they hold up on cast iron excellently, haven't tried steel, I probably won't either because these are for my head porting projects.
customer_reviews.author: R.R

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Junk! Dont buy. About 2 seconds into porting my heads it broke. Head is bonded to shaft and f'd up my head. Stuck with it too because I haven't had time before the return window expired
customer_reviews.author: Ed bowden

customer_reviews.title: Their perfect for my projects
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my electric die grinder. Their perfect for my projects. Not cheaply made and work perfect.
customer_reviews.author: jamie gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Not hot.
customer_reviews.text: The first bit I used broke the tip off, so I can't say if the other bits are any good. I guess for the price, what could anyone expect.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Labuda

customer_reviews.title: Best deal die grinders
customer_reviews.text: Strong cutters and grinders. Used them to grind down a chainsaw bar and there was no perceived wear to tool.
customer_reviews.author: Kimball

customer_reviews.title: ... on Amazon I chose this one and am very happy. Great quality set
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews on some of the other Burr Sets available on Amazon I chose this one and am very happy. Great quality set!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Dame

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tools for a great price. Used one of the bits so far and it cut better than expected!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great burr set!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Had to grind out some aluminum brackets for a project car, and the bit I used worked quickly, never gummed up, and didn't dull at all. 1/4" shank fits most air die grinders and the case holds them all so you don't have to go searching when its time to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Joey L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal, this whole kit for the price of what one or two rotary burrs usually cost individually. I've used a few of them so far and they are equal in quality to the ones I've bought from McMaster-Carr.
customer_reviews.author: Eb33

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and great value
customer_reviews.text: When you purchase this type of tool on line, it's hard to tell just what kind of quality you're going to get, especially at such a reasonable price. These burrs are definitely top quality, and an outstanding value at the price. I have put these through some pretty serious punishment, grinding to clean up welds, and shaping steel. So far, they have shown no indications of wear, and I have used them a lot! I would definitely recommend these for general use.
customer_reviews.author: Busted Flush

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for about a year and have used them quite a bit to grind down solid steel motorcycle foot pegs for a project I was working on. They are sharp and seem to hold a decent edge to them. For the price I don't think you can go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: DuderMaguder

customer_reviews.title: I have only used them twice now and both times ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only used them twice now and both times on aluminum which I don't believe they are intended for but I used wd-40 with them and they never got plugged up with aluminum.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Stromback

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this kit after the set I bought from Harbor Freight imploded on first use against metal. These bits feel solid in your hand. I have used them for about 3 hours now specifically for grinding bushings out of metal control arms and they arent even slightly hinting at dulling out.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my brother in law-he said they were just what he was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Christine L. Bergwin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work great, used them to port aluminum and cast iron motors all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron C

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have not had a chance to use them yet, but the quality looks descent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until heavy use on steel
customer_reviews.text: Had several teeth break off as I was using to grind holes larger in some 1/8" steel. Haven't tried to get replacements for them yet. If they give me replacements I'll use them for wood and soft metals but probably not on steel again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These burrs cut way better than expected, and probably better than they should for their price. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Carbide Rotary cutting and demurring bits
customer_reviews.text: Cut perfectly, used to port and blueprint heads. Various shapes allow fine tuning work.
customer_reviews.author: Da Coast

customer_reviews.title: Received timely and performed perfectly. I was expecting a ...
customer_reviews.text: Received timely and performed perfectly. I was expecting a "cheap" grade of bit that may or may not last through my task. No problem at all. Can't tell I even used it.
customer_reviews.author: Don G.

customer_reviews.title: Quite useful!
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought a set of these bits years ago. I used three different ones the first week I had them! Rather than using a file, these bits when used in my air powered die grinder made quick work of modifications I made in some aluminum and steel car brackets.
customer_reviews.author: K.A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: All bits still in great shape after a number of hours of grinding
customer_reviews.text: Yup they grind aluminum and cast iron. All bits still in great shape after a number of hours of grinding. Cool
customer_reviews.author: Stewart E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: For the price the quality is good. Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: For the price the quality is good. Long lasting. Keep the cutting speeds decent and they last. Ported and polished some sbc votec heads and they did great.
customer_reviews.author: banshee

customer_reviews.title: ... harden bolts with the grinding bit and it worked great!
customer_reviews.text: i cut case harden bolts with the grinding bit and it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: frankdmayo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Matched with the Metabo die grinder they can't be surpassed!
customer_reviews.author: Nonexttime

customer_reviews.title: Economical Carbide Burrs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my die grinder. I'm still learning what I can use these for and how to use them. They shape metal nicely and seem durable. If they hold up, a very economical way to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Steve

customer_reviews.title: Works great in my die grinder.
customer_reviews.text: Update after mild use. These are still sharp and working well. Quality tool.
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Emily

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality.
customer_reviews.text: These things are really sharp, and very tough. I use them frequently to grind into tight spaces. These cut, not grind. Very little sparking!
customer_reviews.author: A. Troskoski

customer_reviews.title: Rotary Burrs
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be high quality and I experience no vibrations from my tool which means they are centered on the shank correctly and ground true. I bought a set for my brother as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: David Vranish

customer_reviews.title: This cutting set works great on metal ( cast iron is what I used ...
customer_reviews.text: This cutting set works great on metal ( cast iron is what I used it on) also works on Aluminum ( use wax block to keep down clogging).
customer_reviews.author: JOHN  LEWIS

customer_reviews.title: great value  - They can take a lot of abuse.
customer_reviews.text: I am still using these on our farm for random work. They are a good buy in the "not quite pro" category. They do last really well and are totally different grade than the cheap stuff (I consider these cheap too but I mean to compare to harbor-freight level).
customer_reviews.author: Heikki Anttila

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: After giving up and throwing out 2 different sets of much less expensive burrs, I bought these. These I will keep - sturdy, well crafted tools that really work. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy a carbide burr tool from Snap On but for the price of one tool from Snap On, I purchased the entire set. This set give me various options when working on different project and works well.
customer_reviews.author: TLe

customer_reviews.title: Product purchased
customer_reviews.text: Astro Pneumatic carbon bits was what I was looking for. Priced reasonable, got it in average time. Product is hard to find in set li8ke this, suit's my purpose very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be very tough
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to work on an exhaust manifold and it got the job done lickity split. I just used one bit so far and it seems to be wearing little so my hopes are these will last for quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Sttickman

customer_reviews.title: nice quality set
customer_reviews.text: have had these for about three years and still holding up great. I use on average of once a month as a professional mechanic. These are a must have in your tool box.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bits but I would had given a 5 star if they had a better protective case
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Sharp
customer_reviews.text: I use these burrs to carve soapstone and alabaster. They work very well for these stones. I like the variety of shapes and sizes in the set.
customer_reviews.author: Kate B.

customer_reviews.title: Cuts metal well
customer_reviews.text: Ground through welds very well. I did chip some teeth, but some of the metal was jagged and the burr caught on these areas, chipping some teeth. Overall the burrs cut well and performed as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K Miller

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made kit and all the bits were well made along with the case.
customer_reviews.author: Velocity

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Nice case so as not to loose the pieces, quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am quite happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this set. It is exactly what I wanted. It performs like I expected it to do. I'll recommend it to all those who like to exercise their hobby's at home.
customer_reviews.author: Harold R. Harms

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They seem to cut great and have held up so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: These worked great when I ported a set of heads. I really like this product..
customer_reviews.author: Gooker928

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Set of Cutters
customer_reviews.text: I've needed a set of these for a long time, and they don't disappoint. They cut great and are yet to dull at all. Zero complaints, and the low price is a major bonus.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product at an even better price. I don't know that I would have paid full price, but since I've always seen them in sale it was a no brained to grab them. And aviation maintainers best friend.
customer_reviews.author: 4est

customer_reviews.title: They are ok
customer_reviews.text: First one broke less than a minute after putting it in the grinder. The others have held up well.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. Makes the job pretty easy. Used them to port out cast iron on hot side of turbo. I used this with makita electric grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Traci L

customer_reviews.title: It has good cut, excellent finish
customer_reviews.text: It has good cut, excellent finish, are durable and fast cutting .... Very good protective storage box in my workshop
customer_reviews.author: WILMEN L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and they hold their sharpness longer than I expected. They still have yet to dull.
customer_reviews.author: Mulva

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Used on cast Iron many times. Thay still cut and very good. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: bobby hancock

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Works for me just perfect! Thanks a lot! Works wonderful with my Makita! If one has Makita Die Grinder and works with wood - just perfect addition.
customer_reviews.author: Sarmat

product_meta.title: Astro Pneumatic Tool 2181 8-Piece Double Cut Carbide Rotary Burr Set 1/4" Shank in Blow Molded Case
product_meta.description:
Style:Standard lengthFROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Astro Pneumatic 2181 Double Cut Carbide Rotary Burr Set with 1/4-Inch Shank is used for metal working in mold and pattern making, die sinking, surface cleaning and maintenance. Set includes SA, SC, SD and SF type burrs. Wide range of uses includes body shops, fabrication shops, brake shops, industrial shops, die manufacturers, etc.
feature_bullets: The original trusted source for the industry’s best selling carbide burrs that last
Perfect for opening holes, or porting heads on ferrous materials
Sintered and machined from 100% new raw tungsten carbide
Unique tooth angle prevents chipping for the longest lasting design possible
1 year warranty from manufacturer with simple replacement process

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars377 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
